name: The Way Home: Incredible Time Travel Arcade Adventure
name_original: The Way Home: Incredible Time Travel Arcade Adventure
description:
As part of a time traveling experiment that went a little… kaka, you are now bouncing around in time, ending up in the bodies and lives of different people. Set things right in their lives in order to get back to your own time. Will the next jump take you home?

An arcade game about time travel, adventures, intriguing stories and great, fast gameplay!

FEATURES
* Experience a great adventure traveling in time!

* Relive important and incredible moments of both normal and famous people!

* Jump into the skin of a taxi driver, Einstein or even a pregnant teenager!

* Enjoy 40 casual levels, each time getting closer home!

* Get help from your friends to pass the levels easier.

* Be the quickest jumper and reach the top of the Leaderboards!

* A tribute to Quantum Leap, one of the best series that the developers of this game have seen(True Story)!

2.3 billion players from 73 galaxies, 373 planets and 15 different years can't be wrong! ;)

"Yeah, definitely. I love it. Much great. Do want." - Pressured Hitchhiker

" 'oH tIv lot. Dunmo' puS romulans chon " - Kerpach(Klingon)

".. - / .. ... / -- --- .-. . / ..-. ..- -. / - --- / - .- .--. / - .... .. ... / --. .- -- . / - .... .- -. / -- -.-- / - . .-.. . --. .-. .- .--. ...." Samuel Morse(1843)

DISCLAIMERS:
* Time travel insurance not included. We are not responsible or liable for any damages or losses due to your travels through time!

* You are not allowed to bring or carry anything with you from one jump to the next. This includes other people, objects, dinosaurs, inventions, antiques or that funny wig you set your eyes on.

* No Tardis is included with this time traveling experience!
